__e: His transition from this world was corrupted by violence.
His first day on a new post he sees a man in a ward for the war damaged.
You have to understand, Eric. It's not that your father's trying to be a bad guy. It's just that he's been irreparably damaged by war.
As far as I can tell, you haven't damaged the baby.
I think... I think I was the one who damaged the ship.
Madam... you have done enough to damage the good name of this family.
Besides, I have been damaged and cannot aid you in battle.
I crashed right on top of the Goa'uld who ruled that planet, which was fortunate because my ship was too badly damaged to repair, and I needed help.
she's not going to wake up.
